header.headline: NOVA REMEDY
header.description: At Nova Remedy, we want to make the world of healthcare more human. By empowering you to take control of your health journey, our goal is to help you develop a personalized program of health, behavior, and diet.

props.title: CUSTOMIZED
props.description: Customized healing plans for many chronic diseases built by doctors

props.title: INTEGRATIVE
props.description: Combining Eastern and Western medicine to focus on prevention

props.title: HOLISTIC
props.description: Focus on healing the whole body through research-based health plans

props.title: Mobile
props.description: Digital platform with over 120 videos and courses built by medical professionals

props.title: INTERACTIVE
props.description: Real-time live chat with accredited doctors and medical professionals

about.headline: Our Goal: Empowering Patients
about.description: Nova Remedy was founded with one main goal: empowering patients to take control of their health with personalized programs combining Eastern & Western medicine practices that focus on healthy lifestyle, behavior, and emotional choices.

diseases.headline: Our Videos Aim to Prevent These Chronic Diseases

doctor.headline: Speak with Our Accredited Medical Professionals
doctor.description: Our group of accredited medical professionals come from a wide range of backgrounds, disciplines, and educations.

videos.headline: CUSTOMIZED VIDEO PLANS
videos.description: With 120+ videos on the Nova Remedy platform, we aim to prevent chronic diseases through easy-to-follow video tutorials that target different parts of the body and issues that can stem from those areas.

process.headline: The Process
process.description: Our three-step process takes a multi-faceted approach to customizing your health plan, taking diet, activity levels, current medical issues, and more into account.

steps.title: Take the survey
steps.description: Answer questions about your diet, exercise, and chronic diseases.

steps.title: Receive your assessment
steps.description: Receive a custom exercise plan based on your results.

steps.title: Begin your health journey
steps.description: Start your recommended exercise and nutrition plan.
